Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text:
Great pizzas, very friendly people working there and efficient.
my to go place for take away pizza, delivery is also free which is nice.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Well the pizza is very ‚Äúnormal‚Äù I think You come there more for experience to grab pizza from boat rather than actually for mind blowing pizza. So recommend for experience and social part because it can be quite busy so You can talk/meet ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Of course this is a really nice place to pick up a pizza directly from your boat. So make sure to go here. Just make sure your pizza is well done (hot everywhere). The assortiment could also be more authentic.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Not exactly an amazing pizza, but it‚Äôs good, and it‚Äôs very cool to be able to buy from the boat, since they have a window by the water level! I always do a boat tour that passes by it eventually, always a success with guests‚Ä¶.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: It's our favourite neighbourhood pizza place for takeaway.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Just across the bridge is hotel okura.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam, delivered straight to the boat. Amazeing experience ü•∞

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Never seen such a rude person working a cozy restaurant, the old man really needs to learn how to treat people, disgusting

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Good pizzas, the owners are a bit odd and don‚Äôt seem to like getting business but all part of the charm.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Great pizza. Very fresh and unpretentious.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Pizzas aren't bad here, but the best feature about this restaurant has to be the order window adjacent to the water, where you can pick up your food from a boat.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Just across the bridge is hotel okura.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Great pizza. Very fresh and unpretentious.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Amazing pizza, especially 3 cheeses with pepperoni pizza, while being docked down below. They also have a toilet!

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: I loved this place. I ordered pizza on six different occasions while on vacation. Very fresh, well made. Wish I lived near something like this in US.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Good price, taste and concept of having a pier to pick up your pizzas. Don‚Äôt expect hot pizzas due the weather :)

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Must try if you're on a boat ride through Amsterdam!

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Good pizza, nice owner!

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: Very cute pizzeria in a bridge tower. You can also pick up your pizza when coming by boat.

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very, very, very tasty pizza. Cooking italian forty years old. So Italian that he speaks English on his fingers. The interior of the institution is very specific, but it has some kind of charm accessible only to ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Have ordered two pizzas here. Often bought here, because business is around the corner. Although the topping was OK, the bottom looked like old wallpaper. When I complained about that, the answer was "It's very busy ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: (Translated by Google) You can order pizza even if you get sticky by boat from the canal. It's basically a takeaway, but you can eat it even in a small store. Prices start at EUR 8.5 for Margherita and EUR 10 for pasta. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: (Translated by Google) First time, pizza ordered was fast, tasty and good. Enjoyed it !!! ‚Ä¶

Name: Pizzeria San Marco
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Enjoy your boat through Mokum. And then just call San Marco for takeaway pizzas. Half an hour later you sail and you can pick them up on the water! You can also go to the toilet. Top! ‚Ä¶
